subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kelly Johnson and Chipper Jones hit solo homers and the Atlanta Braves beat the defending World Series champion Philadelphia Phillies 4-0 to send the Phillies to their fourth straight 0-2 start.
snippet: Kelly Johnson and Chipper Jones hit solo homers and the Atlanta Braves beat the defending World Series champion Philadelphia Phillies 4-0 to send the Phillies to their fourth straight 0-2 start.
